summary.span: 表示映射函数或对可变返回序列的查询的结果。

span.span: Represents the results of mapped functions or queries with variable return sequences.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在下面的 SQL 代码示例中，结果形状取决于输入（`shape =1` 或 `shape = 2`）。In the following SQL code example, the result shape depends on the input (`shape =1` or `shape = 2`). 返回投影的顺序是不确定的。The order that the projections are returned is undefined. ## Examples ``` CREATE PROCEDURE VariableResultShapes(@shape int) AS if(@shape = 1) select CustomerID, ContactTitle, CompanyName from customers else if(@shape = 2) select OrderID, ShipName from orders ``` [!code-csharp[DLinqSprox#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqSprox/cs/northwind-sprox.cs#4)] [!code-vb[DLinqSprox#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqSprox/vb/northwind-sprox.vb#4)]

span.span: Retrieves the next result as a sequence of a specified type.

returns.span: 用于循环访问结果的枚举。

span.span: An enumeration for iterating over the results.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您将使用类似于以下内容的代码来执行此存储过程。You would use code similar to the following to execute this stored procedure. > [!NOTE] > 您必须根据您对存储过程的认识，使用 模式获取正确类型的枚举数。You must use the pattern to obtain an enumerator of the correct type, based on your knowledge of the stored procedure. ## Examples [!code-csharp[DLinqSprox#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqSprox/cs/Program.cs#5)] [!code-vb[DLinqSprox#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqSprox/vb/Module1.vb#5)]
